defaultText:
This is c-markdown-editor, the Concordant collaborative editor.

In the "Document:" box, name your document. Two browsers accessing the same document name will be sharing their edits through the Concordant platform. A document is persistent; however we reset the server periodically to limit possible abuse.

The usual Markdown conventions apply: # for titles, *for italics*, etc. Alternatively you can use the buttons at the top.

You can download your document as a Markdown file, using the rightmost button.

Please contact mailto:support@concordant.io with any issues.

Known issues with this version include: poor interactive performance; no support for disconnected mode; the local user is not aware of the cursors of remote users.
